review: I first bought the Roku 3 and really enjoyed it. I thought I might like to stream in my bedroom so I bought the Amazon Fire stick. After dealing with the Roku, I just have to say I was really let down with the Fire stick. The interface I have found works so much better with the Roku and I didn't really like the Firestick's remote either. so I put the firestick in my office and I bought the Roku stick. I wasn't in to gaming anyway so it has all the features that I use with the Roku 3.
